title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 27 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 27 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: CDC to reverse course, recommend masks for vaccinated people. Fauci has been on both sides of every issue. The media always had to issue a correction on an incorrect Trump story, but never once on Facui... Why? Because he's the dear leader, the lab coat tyrant extraordinaire. Fredo Cuomo: Don't make me, make you get the vaccine. Why is no one talking about natural immunity? What are you gonna do when the mask mandate comes for you? Social media companies are gonna say you're not allowed to say that masks don't work for kids. It's up to parents to push back on the mask mandates in schools.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
